name: x-card-rpg
title: X-Card Rpg
description: Yet another module for Foundry VTT that implements the X-Card safety tool by John Stavropoulos. http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg. This module adds the possibility to broadcast an x-card during the game at any time. A button is added to the basic controls to do this. You also have the possibility to provide your own x-card image. Finally a message is added to the chat window when the button is clicked.
author: Aurélien Chappard (Deefuse)
